import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './tradeboardDetail.css' import axios from 'axios'; import {match} from "http-proxy-middleware/dist/context-matcher"; function TradeDetailPage(props) { const [trade, setTrade] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fetchTrade(); }, []); const fetchTrade = async () => { const response = await axios.get(`/api/trades/${match.params.id}`); setTrade(response.data); }; return (
